AIR_PROCESSORS_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
AIR_PROCESSORS_DESCRIPTION.message: Déantar dóigh den aer glan nuair a bhíonn sé fairsing. Deirtear gur tháinig an teicneolaíocht a ghlanann an t-aer ó dhéantáin eachtardhomhanda a aimsíodh ar Mhars. Déanann neart comhlachtaí próiseálaithe aeir éagsúla atá in ann timpeallacht shábháilte a chruthú as atmaisféir fiú an-chontúirteacha. Ní chuireann rialtais suas le monaplachtaí ar tháirgeadh aeir.

ANIMAL_MEAT_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
ANIMAL_MEAT_DESCRIPTION.message: A major point of controversy, meat is the flesh of animals. With synthetic protein readily available, most people believe that animals should not be killed. While meats are illegal in most core systems, live animals and their meat is an important part of the lives of people on more traditional worlds.

BATTLE_WEAPONS_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
BATTLE_WEAPONS_DESCRIPTION.message: Airm mhíleata, ar nós tancanna foluaineacha armúrtha, agus diúracáin dromchla-go-spás. De ghnáth, bíonn monaplacht rialtais ar a dtrádáil. Is féidir iad a cheannach ar an margadh dubh, ach cosnóidh siad pingin mhaith ort.

CARBON_ORE_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
CARBON_ORE_DESCRIPTION.message: Is é carbón ceann de na heilimintí is forleithne ar ár n-eolas. Is tráchtearra neamhchostasach é, ach tábhachtach mar sin féin, agus baintear úsáid as i dtáirgí plaisteacha, i gcóimhiotail, agus fiú i dtáirgiúlacht cumhachta. Dá bharr seo, iompórtálann beagnach gach coilíneacht thionsclaíoch mianach carbóin.

COMPUTERS_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
COMPUTERS_DESCRIPTION.message: Le mílte bliain anuas, ón abacas, PDP-11, agus slis Motorola 68k, go dtí HAL 9001 agus an líne nua-aimseartha Multivac, tá ríomhairí tar éis tús a chur le ré na faisnéise. Tá ríomhairí riachtanach sa saol, is cuma más mian leat dul isteach i hipearspás, nó físeán de chuibil ghleoite a phostáil ar an AonLíon.

CONSUMER_GOODS_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
CONSUMER_GOODS_DESCRIPTION.message: The end products ready for the general consumer public, without need for further processing. Everything from toothbrushes, kitchen appliances to hover cars.

FARM_MACHINERY_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
FARM_MACHINERY_DESCRIPTION.message: Although rare, it is still possible to catch the occasional farmer with an ox-driven plow. But in almost any place where there is agriculture, machines are used in the cultivation of the land, be it the hydroponics of an underground habitat or the endless fields of a garden world.

FERTILIZER_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
FERTILIZER_DESCRIPTION.message: Ní féidir barra a shaothrú ar scála tionsclaíoch gan leasúcháin a úsáid. Ceadaíonn siad monashaothrú, agus táirgíonn siad torthaí níos fearr ná ithir neamhleasaithe. Go minic, déanann leasúchán dochar don timpeallacht nach bhfuil soiléir i dtús báire.

FRUIT_AND_VEG_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
FRUIT_AND_VEG_DESCRIPTION.message: While there are lots of synthetic alternatives, real fruits and vegetables are still an important part of our cuisine and nutrition. Grown on agricultural worlds or as part of the life support of habitats, and exported to systems in which growing plants is not feasible.

GRAIN_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
GRAIN_DESCRIPTION.message: The backbone of many peoples' diets. It is used in farming, to feed animals, and as a supplement to synthetic foods. Grain is also used in many other foods, such as oatmeal and baked goods. Most star faring cultures grow and consume at least some grains, that have been adopted to the climate of their habitat.

HAND_WEAPONS_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
HAND_WEAPONS_DESCRIPTION.message: Providing insurance beyond the long arm of the law, hand weapons are essential for space traders in far-out systems. However, many governments see them as a threat to their own control over their population and strictly control their trade and possession.

HYDROGEN_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
HYDROGEN_DESCRIPTION.message: Used as fuel for hyperdrives and propellant for starships, hydrogen is an extremely important element. Fortunately it is also the most common element in the universe, although storing it isn't trivial. It is usually among the cheapest commodities on the stock market. Starports are well supplied at any given time.

INDUSTRIAL_MACHINERY_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
INDUSTRIAL_MACHINERY_DESCRIPTION.message: Innealra atá ag teastáil ar línte cóimeála, i scaglanna, i mbruithneoirí, agus mar chuid d'innealra eile a tháirgeoidh earraí eile. Tá ardscileanna de dhíth chun na meaisíní casta seo a dhéanamh.

LIQUID_OXYGEN_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
LIQUID_OXYGEN_DESCRIPTION.message: Liquid oxygen has many purposes, most commonly in medical and industrial applications and sometimes also used in waste treatment. It is very affordable, as oxygen is easy to obtain from water.

LIQUOR_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
LIQUOR_DESCRIPTION.message: Most outposts have a local brew that outsiders find hard to stomach. Alcohol can be banned in some systems as it is deemed to cloud the mind. Regardless of the law, a shot of scotch is almost always available on the black market, for a price.

LIVE_ANIMALS_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
LIVE_ANIMALS_DESCRIPTION.message: Ar chúiseanna daonnachta, eacnamaíochta, agus éiceolaíochta, tá rialacháin dochta, agus uaireanta cosc iomlán, ar thógáil agus ar thrádáil ainmhithe ina lán réaltchoras i ngar don chroí. Níos faide amach, is cuid thábhachtach de shaol an phobail é beostoc, mar fhoinse cothúcháin agus mar bheithígh iompair. Glacann zúnna agus tearmainn dúlra páirt i dtrádáil ainmhithe freisin timpeall an réaltra, faoi rialúcháin an stáit, le troid in aghaidh seilge mídhleathaí.

MEDICINES_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
MEDICINES_DESCRIPTION.message: Derived from natural sources, or synthesized artificially, medicines are needed everywhere humans go. From curing the common cold to combat the adverse effects of prolonged space travel, medicines are essential to the prosperity of an interstellar humanity. Carefully watched by customs agents, as it is not uncommon to disguise narcotics as medical drugs.

METAL_ALLOYS_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
METAL_ALLOYS_DESCRIPTION.message: After metal ore is extracted and refined, it is processed and ends up as various alloys. An alloy is an amalgamation of metals, rather than a single pure element, combined in exact proportions to gain specific desirable traits. Therefore, most consumer metals are alloys.

METAL_ORE_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
METAL_ORE_DESCRIPTION.message: Many colonies mine metal ores for export, to be refined and used in industrial manufacturing. Used in everything from small toys to spaceships, metal in all its forms is essential to modern civilization.

MILITARY_FUEL_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
MILITARY_FUEL_DESCRIPTION.message: Úsáidte mar bhreosla i dtiomáintí míleata níos cumhachtaí. Táirgeann na tiomáintí seo dramhaíl núicléach nach foláir a dhiúscairt. Ós rud é gur ábhar sintéiseach é, tá breosla míleata níos costasaí agus níos annaimhe ná hidrigin, agus níl aon fháil air go nádúrtha.

MINING_MACHINERY_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
MINING_MACHINERY_DESCRIPTION.message: Laghdaítear an sclábhaíocht a bhaineann leis an mianadóireacht le meaisíní a chabhraíonn le mianadóirí mianta éagsúla a aimsiú, a thochailt, agus a aistriú go dtí an tsaoráid phróiseála is gaire.

NARCOTICS_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
NARCOTICS_DESCRIPTION.message: Substaintí nádúrtha nó sintéiseacha a athraíonn staid na hintinne nó staid an choirp. Cé go bhfuil drugaí in úsáid go forleathan mar chaitheamh aimsire nó ar mhaithe le sláinte, is minic go mbíonn sé in aghaidh an dlí drugaí a sheoladh nó a thrádáil.

NERVE_GAS_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
NERVE_GAS_DESCRIPTION.message: Glactar leis go ginearálta gur arm ollscriosta é néarghás. Is annamh a úsáidtear é, fiú i gcomhthéacs míleata, agus tá sé mídhleathach i mbeagnach gach réaltchóras.

PLASTICS_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
PLASTICS_DESCRIPTION.message: Ábhair shintéiseacha agus leathshintéiseacha a úsáidtear ina lán táirgí, ó ghnáthearraí tí go spáslonga. Tá sé éasca go leor iad a úsáid sa déantúsaíocht agus níl sé costasach iad a dhéanamh. Imríonn siad ról tábhachtach sa tsibhialtacht dhaonna.

PRECIOUS_METALS_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
PRECIOUS_METALS_DESCRIPTION.message: Go ginearálta, ní bhíonn miotail lómhara chomh himoibríoch le miotail eile agus tá sé níos deacra iad a bhaint as mianach. Dá bharr sin, tá luach mór eacnamaíochta le miotail lómhara ar nós óir, airgid, platanaim, agus eilimintí tearcithreach. Baintear úsáid as ór, sileacan, agus eilimintí tearcithreach éagsúla i ríomhairí agus i dtáirgí leictreonacha eile.

RADIOACTIVES_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
RADIOACTIVES_DESCRIPTION.message: Táirgeann imoibreoirí núicléacha agus hipirthiomáintí míleata dramhaíl núicléach, ábhar atá an-deacair agus an-chontúirteach a iompar agus a dhiúscairt. Dá bharr seo,  tabharfaidh go leor spásphort airgead duit as fáil réidh le dramhaíl bhreise. Tá sé in aghaidh an dlí dramhaíl núicléach a dhumpáil.

ROBOTS_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
ROBOTS_DESCRIPTION.message: Iompórtáiltear róbait isteach i réaltchórais tionsclaíocha agus mianadóireachta go minic, toisc go bhfuil siad in ann obair a dhéanamh a bheadh ródheacair, róleadránach, nó róchontúirteach d'oibrithe daonna. Baintear úsáid astu mar pholaiteoirí agus mar dhlíodóirí freisin.

RUBBISH_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
RUBBISH_DESCRIPTION.message: The byproduct of civilization, consisting of industrial waste, household garbage, and worn down equipment. Most waste is reprocessed, recycled or sent to starports for transport off-world. Dumping garbage in inhabited systems is almost always illegal. Starports usually charge a fee for waste disposal, but will also pay you to take it away.

SLAVES_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
SLAVES_DESCRIPTION.message: As machines have replaced slaves as the engine that powers civilization, slavery is now almost universally seen as immoral, and transgression against a ban draws the strictest punishment. However, despite the best efforts of humanitarians, slavery is still prevalent, even in developed worlds.

TEXTILES_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
TEXTILES_DESCRIPTION.message: Is éard atá i dteicstílí ná fabraicí simplí, fite ó shnáth sintéiseach nó ó shnáth a bhí déanta as planda nó as ainmhí. Dé ghnáth, is é róbait a tháirgeann teicstílí i monarchana móra, ach tá fíodóirí daonna ann a dhéanann a gcuid teicstílí féin fós.

WATER_DESCRIPTION.description: This is an artistic description of the commodity. Translate as you deem appropriate or come up with your own description, long or short, its up to you.
WATER_DESCRIPTION.message: Essential for life as we know it, an often overlooked commodity, water is needed wherever humanity roams. As such, the vast majority of off-world colonies import water from comets or planets like Earth. Water is used on a massive scale for hydrogen and oxygen production.
